programme.title: Errors of the Human Body
programme.desc: After losing his son to a rare genetic condition, a scientist (Michael Eklund) begins work on a regenerative drug that, unfortunately, yields terrible consequences.

programme.title: Hatching
programme.desc: After finding a wounded bird, a girl brings its strange egg home and nurtures it until it hatches. The creature that emerges soon becomes her closest friend and a living nightmare, plunging her into a twisted reality that her mother refuses to see.

programme.title: Pledge
programme.desc: Turned down by every frat, three college misfits receive an unexpected invitation from a shadowy social club. They soon find themselves caught in a sadistic initiation ritual that goes from depraved to deadly over the course of two blood-soaked days.

programme.title: Victim
programme.desc: A twisted doctor (Bob Bancroft) and his brutal henchman kidnap a young man (Stephen Weigand) for their own nefarious purposes.

programme.title: The Wretched
programme.desc: A defiant teenage boy, struggling with his parent's imminent divorce, faces off with an old witch who has possessed the neighbor next door.

programme.title: Welcome to Mercy
programme.desc: Stricken with stigmata, Madaline travels to a convent where nothing is what it seems -- and her friend August is seemingly the only person she can trust. Together, they must confront the demons inside Madaline before she becomes the Antichrist.

programme.title: Desolation
programme.desc: When a widow ventures into a remote wilderness area with her son and best friend to spread her husband's ashes, a mysterious hiker begins dogging them and forces them to confront their deepest fears.

programme.title: The Housemaid
programme.desc: On a plantation in 1953 Indochina, a troubled young housemaid finds comfort in the arms of the widowed owner, until his deceased wife returns to object.

programme.title: Haunter
programme.desc: The ghost of a teenager (Abigail Breslin) tries to protect a young girl (Eleanor Zichy) and her family from a dead serial killer (Stephen McHattie) who can possess the living.

programme.title: The Den
programme.desc: A young woman studying the habits of webcam users witnesses a murder online and becomes the killer's next target.

programme.title: VFW
programme.desc: A typical night for veterans at a VFW turns into a battle for survival when a desperate teen runs into the bar. When a gang of punks come looking for her, the vets use every weapon at their disposal to protect themselves from an unrelenting attack.

programme.title: Beneath
programme.desc: Coal miners become trapped 600 feet below the surface. As the air grows toxic and time runs out, the crew descends into madness and turns on one another.

programme.title: The Other Lamb
programme.desc: A young woman born into an all-female cult beings to question the teachings of her leader.

programme.title: The Night
programme.desc: A couple become trapped inside a hotel with their demons -- real and imagined -- until they can confront the secrets of their marriage.
